content: Though Tom's English seems quite good at times, he doesn't seem to know his limitations and it's impossible to convince him that he's wrong when he makes a mistake.
translations: ita:Anche se l'inglese di Tom sembra piuttosto buono a volte, non sembra che lui conosca i suoi limiti, ed Ã¨ impossibile con
